description: This file defines a Dart class 'AppConstants' that centralizes and manages application-wide constants such as app name, spacing, radii, and padding for a Flutter app.

classes.name: AppConstants
classes.description: A class containing static constants for app-wide configuration such as app name, UI spacing, radii, and screen padding.

methods.name: AppConstants._
methods.description: A private constructor to prevent instantiation of the class, indicating it is used solely as a namespace for constants.
